sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { Application } from '../model/application.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-table', templateUrl: './table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./table.component.css'] }) export class TableComponent { @Input("applications") applications: Array = []; @Input("showForm") showForm: boolean = false; @Output() actionEmitter = new EventEmitter(); toDate(value: number) : Date { return new Date(value); } getDescription(value: any) : string { return value ? value : "-"; } emitEvent(action: string, application: Application) { this.actionEmitter.emit({action: action, application: application}); } }

No applications found.
